excerpt: "Verve Group today (July 26th, 2023) announces that Match2One – its easy-to-use self-service advertising platform for businesses within e-commerce, financial trading and fintech, and iGaming – has embedded Verve Group’s Moments.AI contextual advertising technology into its platform."
